markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Wasp Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=406)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wasp nests are made of chewed wood fibers foraged from the surrounding flora, which the wasps make into a material similar to paper. A single wasp nest can house thousands of individuals that emerge as a massive swarm. Most swarms attack only to protect their nest or if otherwise agitated, though druids and other primal enchanters can bend these venomous vermin to their will—to deadly effect.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Wasp Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=406)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 324</row>

**Perception** +10; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
precision, swarm mind

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 7, piercing 7, slashing 3

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, splash damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Swarming Stings** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm’s space takes 2d8 piercing damage (DC 21 basic Reflex save) and is exposed to wasp venom. A successful save negates the poison exposure.

**Wasp Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 21; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison and clumsy 2 (2 rounds)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-99" />
name: Wasp Swarm
